title: Foster Care Forms (Social Services Law Sections 384, 384-C)
content:
Foster Care Forms (Social Services Law Sections 384, 384-C)

State Regulations

Form 384-1 - Petition for approval of surrender instrument

Form 384-2 - Order directing service in proceeding for approval of surrender instrument

Form 384-3 - Notice of proceeding for approval of surrender instrument

Form 384-4 - Order approving of denying surrender instrument (child not in foster care)

Form 384-c-1 - Notice of proceeding

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
